item.title: Jade add a quote by Susan Scott
item.description: "Listen. In every office you hear the threads of love and joy and fear and guilt, the cries for celebration and reassurance, and somehow you know that connecting those threads is what you are supposed to do and business takes care of itself." -- Susan Scott

item.title: Jade add a quote by Susan Scott
item.description: "The great differentiator going forward, the next frontier for exponential growth, the place where individuals and organizations will find a new and sustainable competitive edge, resides in the area of human connectivity." -- Susan Scott

item.title: Jade add a quote by Susan Scott
item.description: "Accountable Authentic Collaborative Courageous Passionate Lifelong learner Welcomes feedback Biased toward action Solution oriented Change agent" -- Susan Scott

item.title: Jade add a quote by Susan Scott
item.description: "Has a sense of humor. (Preferably warped.) We know who we are" -- Susan Scott

item.title: Jade add a quote by Dave Gray, Sunni Brown, James Macanufo
item.description: "The most common and powerful fire-starter is the question. A good question is like an arrow you can aim at any challenge." -- Dave Gray, Sunni Brown, James Macanufo

item.title: Jade add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
